meta_description: {hackathonName}. Up to $21,500 in prizes. Explore Bitcoin. Explore Privacy. Ship on Starknet. February 1 - February 28, 2026.
og_description: Up to $21,500 in prizes. Explore Bitcoin. Explore Privacy. Ship on Starknet.
hero_subtitle_line1: Explore Bitcoin. Explore Privacy. Ship on Starknet.
hero_tracks_subtitle: Bitcoin track · Privacy track · Open track
hero_subtitle_privacy: Focus on Privacy: Master ZK proofs, ship trustless apps on Starknet, and secure your spot on DoraHacks.
hero_grant_note: Winners can apply for seed grants and accelerators by the Starknet Foundation; selections are made by panel review.
section_why_title: Why 2026 is the Year for Bitcoin and Privacy
stat_1_label: StarkWare's Stwo prover deployed on Starknet mainnet in 2025, delivering major efficiency gains for scalable privacy, faster proofs, and lower costs
stat_2_label: BTC staked natively on Starknet through trustless staking, powering BTCFi with real yields, liquid staking, and Bitcoin-backed DeFi without wrappers or soft forks
stat_3_label: Starknet's programmable privacy layer integrating Zcash shielding with Cairo smart contracts, enabling quantum-safe, confidential compute for Bitcoin-integrated apps
quote_1_text: The next 8 years in crypto will be the Privacy Era.
quote_1_cite: — Balaji Srinivasan, The 3 Eras of Crypto podcast, January 1, 2026
quote_2_text: Privacy is a critical feature for finance to move onchain.
quote_2_cite: — a16z crypto, "17 things we're excited about for crypto in 2026", December 2025
story_blurb: Imagine transforming your ZK idea into a funded project like past Starknet winners.
section_tracks_subtitle: Up to $21,500 prize pool · Awards subject to project quality
successsubtitle: Winning opens doors. What comes next depends on your project, your goals, and how you want to grow.
successtimeline: Win the hackathon and receive support from the Starknet Foundation to improve your product and access programs such as seed grants, accelerators in Bali and Honduras, expert advice, fundraising support, and connections.
successpath1desc: Apply for seed grants up to $25K through Foundation review
successpath2desc: Apply for mentorship and launch support
successnote: Winners can apply for grants and accelerator programs—selection is based on project merit and panel review. Some teams skip grants entirely and go straight to fundraising or launch independently.
casestudy1quote: The hackathon was just the beginning.
section_details_subtitle: Preview what's on DoraHacks – full rules, timelines, and more.
details_timeline_a: Registration: Jan 19 - Feb 28, 2026. Hacking: Feb 1-28. Submissions due: Feb 28, 23:59 UTC. Judging: Mar 1-13. Winners announced: Mar 15.
details_eligibility_a: Open to individuals (age of majority), teams, and organizations. No geo restrictions (except sanctioned countries). All skill levels welcome.
details_submissions_a: Via DoraHacks: Include GitHub repo, demo video (≤3 min), and Starknet testnet/mainnet deployment. Must be original work created during the hackathon.
details_judging_a: Equally weighted criteria: Technological Execution (well built?), Innovation (original?), Impact (solves real problems?), Presentation (clearly explained?), Progress (achieved during hackathon?).
details_prizes_a: Prizes paid in STRK tokens within 60 days. Sponsors may withhold prizes if submissions don't meet quality standards. Full terms on DoraHacks.
details_ip_rules_a: You retain ownership. Grant non-exclusive license for promotion. Follow DoraHacks code of conduct (no harassment, inclusive). Original work only.
details_support_a: DoraHacks forums, Discord channels, and mentor office hours. Check 'Resources' tab on DoraHacks.
track_privacy_description: Build privacy-preserving applications using STARKs, zero-knowledge proofs, and confidential transactions on Starknet.
track_bitcoin_description: Create BTC-native DeFi leveraging Starknet's security.
track_open_description: Build any innovative product on Starknet. Gaming, social, payments—surprise us with real use cases.
resources_subtitle: New to Starknet? Choose your track and start building.
resource_bitcoin_description: Build trustless BTC bridges and OP_CAT apps
resource_privacy_description: Master ZK proofs and confidential transactions
support_academy_description: Free Cairo courses and documentation to get you building fast
support_ai_description: Tools like ChatGPT, Cursor, and Claude make writing high-quality Cairo simple
support_mentors_description: Direct access to ecosystem experts for technical guidance
mentor_omar_bio: Technical Developer Advocate at Starknet Foundation focused on privacy tech and Monero <-> Starknet atomic swaps. Hackathon lead - send questions or suggestions to Omar Espejel; former StarkWare and Hugging Face AI engineer.
mentor_henri_bio: Ecosystem Lead at Starknet Foundation with a 360-degree view of ecosystem needs and progress. Expert in blockchain governance, zero-knowledge proofs, validity rollups, and BTCFi integrations like tBTC vaults.
mentor_akash_bio: Ecosystem Manager at StarkWare providing hands-on Cairo support and ZK proof optimization. Helps teams ship stronger DeFi, gaming, and BTCFi apps.
mentor_benjamin_bio: Growth Team Lead and DeFi expert at Starknet Foundation focused on incentives, tokenomics, and crypto infrastructure. Guides projects toward sustainable economic models and growth.
mentor_teddy_bio: Privacy Lead on the Product Team at Starknet Foundation building core privacy tooling. Expert in confidential computing, enabling private payments and ZK-based apps.
mentor_adrien_bio: Bitcoin Lead on the Product Team at Starknet Foundation focused on BTC integrations and liquidity bridges. Works on trustless staking, BTCFi apps, and ZK-based scaling.
mentor_jonathan_bio: Growth Lead at Starknet Foundation, strategizing both Bitcoin and privacy adoption while connecting projects with BTCFi opportunities. Expands the ecosystem through partnerships and growth programs.
mentors_subtitle: More mentors and judges will be announced soon
social_proof_note: What hackers love about our hackathons.
social_proof_metric_1_label: Teams receiving grants and accelerator support from the Starknet Foundation
social_proof_metric_2_label: Teams that shipped to mainnet and generated revenue
testimonial_1_quote: Participating in the hackathon was a great experience—it allowed us to validate a real idea, learn a lot in a short amount of time, and connect with strong builders.
testimonial_1_role: Re{solve} Winners → $25K Seed Grant → SNF Accelerator
testimonial_2_quote: Challenge yourself and participate. You nurture your competitive spirit, spend time with an excellent group of developers, and learn to build fast and solve real-life problems.
testimonial_3_quote: Starknet shows what's possible when you're building on infrastructure designed for real-world performance. The native mobile SDK support and built-in scaling made the difference.
testimonial_4_quote: The event greatly expanded my grasp of Starknet's architecture and tooling. Winning was extremely satisfying—developing workable solutions on cutting-edge infrastructure.
testimonial_5_quote: I joined to experiment and push my limits, but left with way more than expected—real learning, great feedback, and an amazing builder community. Winning felt surreal.
sponsors_subtitle: More partners will be announced soon
faq_1_a: Anyone! Solo developers and teams up to 5 members. No geographic restrictions. All skill levels welcome.
faq_2_q: Do I need to know Cairo?
faq_2_a: Not required to start. We provide learning resources through Starknet Academy. Plus, AI tools like ChatGPT, Cursor, and Claude make writing high-quality Cairo extremely simple.
faq_3_a: Winners can apply for seed grants up to $25K from the Starknet Foundation. Projects that continue growing successfully may qualify for additional growth grants.
faq_4_a: Yes. Build at your own pace. Submit on DoraHacks by February 28, 2026.
faq_submit_q: How do I submit my project?
faq_submit_a: All submissions via DoraHacks platform—include GitHub repo, demo video (≤3 min), and Starknet deployment link. Deadline: Feb 28, 2026, 23:59 UTC.
faq_questions_q: What if I have questions during the hack?
faq_questions_a: Join our Telegram group (t.me/+-5zNW47GSdQ1ZDkx) and ask your questions there. Our mentors and community are ready to help!
faq_prizes_a: In STRK tokens within 60 days. Important: Sponsors may award $0 if no submission meets quality standards. Taxes are your responsibility. See full rules on DoraHacks.
final_cta_subtitle: Join the 2026 Bitcoin & Privacy Hackathon. 4 weeks. Up to $21,500 in prizes.
hero_subtitle_build: build privacy solutions by scaling bitcoin
tracks_subtitle_ideas: Every track includes real project ideas for hackers, collected by Starknet Foundation, StarkWare experts, and ecosystem partners. Total prizes up to $21,500 —
tracks_view_breakdown: view the full breakdown on DoraHacks
tracks_prizes_description: Prizes are awarded across tracks based on impact, technical depth, and user experience.
resources_tooling_subtitle: Start with the essentials, then go deeper with verified docs, SDKs, and support channels.
resources_founder_basecamp_desc: From idea to investor-ready pitch — watch at your own pace
resources_docs_index_subtitle: Curated and verified by Starknet Foundation, StarkWare, and ecosystem partners.
